topics.body:
Here's something completely random, but you know how whenever something new comes along people complain about it "being everywhere"?

I threw some random fandoms into the google trends and while it's not a accurate measurement of how many people are in a fandom it does give a ballpark guess of how interested into the fandom people are.

!http://s11.postimg.org/5sl84vj77/2015_07_19_155529_1440x900_scrot.png!
!http://s30.postimg.org/49whbiltt/2015_07_19_160450_1440x900_scrot.png!
